lead_paragraph: Ed Jovanovski left the Vancouver Canucks for a five-year deal worth $32.5 million with the Phoenix Coyotes. Jovanovski, 30, ranked 11th among defensemen in points a game last season. He was selected by Florida with the No. 1 pick in the 1994 draft.
